nodes.text: Rordak was a star in the Rordak system, located in the Pelgrin sector of the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. It was originally orbited by four planets, but millions of years before the time of the Galactic Empire, it expanded to form a red giant, destroying the three innermost planets and leaving only Rordak, the desolate and mountainous homeworld of the Viska species.
